headlines.description: Manchester United suffered a 2-0 defeat at bottom-placed Watford in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd lose at bottom Watford in Pogba return

headlines.description: Chelsea's 2-0 away win against Tottenham in the Premier League on Sunday was marred by reports of a racist incident aimed at Antonio Rudiger.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs fans given racism warnings in Chelsea loss
